4. This Week's Activities

Suggest changes
  • Discussion
  • Assignment:

Discussion

This week’s discussion will be fairly loose, there’s a bunch of reading, and a few tasks we’ll cover in our call. I’ll share an agenda in advance.

Assignment:

  1. Introduce yourself, and goals in our Discourse (private) category!
  2. Watch Katrina, and Amjinth’s story Me, Myself, Maintainer.
  3. Read Kris, Jess and Steve’s stories Me, Myself, Maintainer.
  4. Review Debugger’s Maintainer Pageincluding issues. Don’t worry if you have questions, that’s normal!
  5. Read all about Inclusivity Bugs, including the findings from our Contributor testing on Debugger.
  6. Follow the Debugger repo, and our cohort repo (you only need to follow activity this week).

Help us improve content and suggest changes to this page.
